text: Guajaibona is a genus of land snails with an operculum, terrestrial gastropod mollusks in the family Pomatiidae."Mollusca" . Diversidad Biológica Cubana, accessed 23 March 2011. == Species == Species within the genus Guajaibona include: *Guajaibona petrei (d’Orbigny, 1842) == References == Category:Pomatiidae
title: Guajaibona
